title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, November 14, 2021
description: It was on this day in 1851 that Moby-Dick was published. This historic work entered the public domain this year and begins with the words “Call me Ishmael.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1851 that Moby-Dick was published. This historic work entered the public domain this year and begins with the words “Call me Ishmael.”
